MAN.TITLE: Etherlab Scicos Realtime

DESCRIPTION.P: This Block is a modified version of the scicos constant standard block. The user need this block, if he wants to change this value after Codegeneration by the msr protocol. For further information see the standard Documentation for the CONST_m Block.

MAN.SECTION:
The latest version of Etherlab can be found at
http://www.etherlab.org
